title: Pick your England team to take on South Africa in the Rugby World Cup 2019 final
text:
England face South Africa in the final of the Rugby World Cup on Saturday and there are a number of selection dilemmas facing Eddie Jones.

Jonny May and Jack Nowell are both carrying injuries and there is a question over whether either of them will be 100 per cent fit. If they are unavailable, do you bring in inexperienced Joe Cokanasiga to start or shift Elliot Daly to the wing and put Henry Slade to fullback?

George Ford has surely nailed down a starting spot, but Eddie Jones likes to surprise people. Could Slade or even Jonathan Joseph get the nod in midfield?

Courtney Lawes was excellent against New Zealand but the consistent contribution of George Kruis must still be a tempting option to...
description: England face South Africa in the final of the Rugby World Cup on Saturday and there are a number of selection dilemmas facing Eddie Jones.
